GSD.description:
ext4: fix bug in extents parsing when eh_entries == 0 and eh_depth > 0

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.146 by commit 958b0ee23f5ac106e7cc11472b71aa2ea9a033bc. For more details please see the references link.
